TEXT.TITLE: COLONIAL BANCGROUP INC <CLBGA> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 25 cts vs 55 cts Net 1.3 mln vs 2,460,000 NOTE: 1987 1st qtr includes loan write-offs at banking subsidiary, The Colonial Bank of Mobile, due to loan losses, of 1.3 mln dlrs or 25 cts a share. Reuter
